current_cycle.description: Keeps track of the WHALE distribution cycle

current_cycle_rewards.description: Number of WHALE tokens to be distributed during the current cycle

global_reward_index.description: Used to calculate WHALE rewards accured over time elapsed. Ratio =  Total distributed WHALE tokens / total bond amount

last_distributed.description: Timestamp at which the global_reward_index was last updated

total_bond_amount.description: Total number of WHALE-UST LP tokens staked with the contract

Decimal256.description: A fixed-point decimal value with 18 fractional digits, i.e. Decimal256(1_000_000_000_000_000_000) == 1.0 The greatest possible value that can be represented is 115792089237316195423570985008687907853269984665640564039457.584007913129639935 (which is (2^128 - 1) / 10^18)
